channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Back to BASIC—the Most Consequential Programming Language in the History of Computing
item.description: Coding was a preserve of elites, until BASIC hit the streets.

item.title: US border agents must get warrant before cell phone searches, federal court rules
item.description:
Critics have long argued that device searches at the U.S. border are unconstitutional and violate the Fourth Amendment.

item.title: TikTok Has a Nazi Problem
item.description: Not only is TikTok’s algorithm promoting Neo-Nazi content, extremist organizations are also using the platform to recruit new members and encourage real-world action.

item.title: UK’s Zapp EV plans to expand globally with an early start in India
item.description:
Zapp is launching its urban electric two-wheeler in India in 2025 as it plans to expand globally.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: 12 Best Smartwatches, Editor Tested and Reviewed (2024): Apple Watch, Wear OS, Hybrid Watches, Kids' Watches
item.description: These WIRED-tested wearables reduce your reliance on a phone while keeping you connected.

item.title: Dear Google, who wants an AI-written fan letter?
item.description:
The first time I saw Google’s latest commercial, I wondered, “Is it just me, or is this kind of bad?” By the fourth or fifth time I saw it, I’d stopped wondering. It starts innocuously enough, with a father talking about how much his daughter loves Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone (she “might even be the world’s number […]

item.title: You’re Probably Using Your Air Purifier Wrong
item.description: Placement, filter maintenance, and learning about your air purifier’s settings are all part of good air hygiene.

item.title: MatPat, the first big YouTuber to successfully exit his company, is lobbying for creators on Capitol Hill
item.description:
Though MatPat retired from YouTube, he’s still pretty busy. In fact, he’s been spending a lot of time on Capitol Hill.

item.title: The Best Eco-Friendly Recycled Bags for 2024, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Need a backpack, purse, tote, or even a new shopping bag? These are made from carpets, old sails, fishnets, and plastic bottles.

item.title: A tale of two foldables
item.description:
Samsung is still foldables’ 500-pound gorilla, but the company successes have made the category significantly less lonely in recent years.
